abilities.name: First Law
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Trinity Star
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if you have Grass, Water, and Lightning Pokémon on your Bench. Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
